tiles.testimony_sub: How to tell your story effectively

dos.text: Tell your story truthfully and consistently
Ask for clarification if you don't understand
Take breaks if you feel overwhelmed

donts.text: Don't provide false or inconsistent information
Don't be afraid to show emotion
Don't answer questions you don't understand
Don't give up if the process feels overwhelming

questions.question: Why did you leave your home country?
questions.answer: Be specific about the persecution you faced. Include details about who threatened you, when it happened, and why you believe you were targeted. Mention any evidence you have to support your claims.

questions.question: How did you travel to Austria?
questions.answer: Provide a clear timeline of your journey. Include countries you passed through, how long you stayed in each place, and why you didn't seek protection elsewhere. Be honest about any false documents used.

questions.question: Do you have family members who stayed in your home country?
questions.answer: Explain the situation of family members who remained. If they are safe, explain why your situation is different. If they are also at risk, explain why they couldn't leave or join you.

questions.question: Why didn't you seek protection from authorities in your home country?
questions.answer: Explain if the government was involved in your persecution, if authorities were unable to protect you, or if you were afraid to approach them. Provide specific examples if possible.

questions.question: What would happen if you returned to your home country?
questions.answer: Describe the specific risks you would face. Be detailed about potential consequences and explain why the situation has not improved since you left.

tips.intro: Here are essential interview preparation tips:
tips.1: Prepare your testimony in advance and practice telling your story clearly.
tips.2: Organize all your documents and evidence beforehand.
tips.3: Remember you have the right to an interpreter and legal representation.
tips.4: Take care of your mental health during this stressful process.
